name: BlindTurnerbyKRAMGAM
0:
”Alexa, open the blinds”
”Alexa, close the blinds”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
There’s so many little annoyances in life. So many things to keep track of, things to turn off and on, adjust, and the list keeps growing. KRAMGAM is here to help make life a little easier. With BlindTurner by KRAMGAM, you can completely automate away the pain of constantly adjusting your blinds!

Getting set up is simple:
(1) Download our BlindTurner by KRAMGAM app from the Google Play or iOS App Stores.
(2) Open the app and create a new account or login.
(3) Plug in your BlindTurner device to power, and connect them with the BlindTurner app. NOTE: the "Device Name" used in the configuration is what Alexa will name your device.
(4) Using the Alexa app, enable the BlindTurner by KRAMGAM skill. NOTE: When asked to authenticate, use your login info from the BlindTurner by KRAMGAM app.
(5) Any devices setup with the BlindTurner by KRAMGAM app will automatically be found by Alexa.

You can issue voice commands such as:
- "Alexa, open Bedroom Blinds"
- "Alexa, close Bedroom Blinds"

You can also use Alexa Routines to further automate actions, here are some examples:
- All bedroom blinds open 20% at 7:00AM
- All living room blinds open 50% at 10:00AM
- All blinds close at sunset

If you have any questions or run into any trouble at all, please email us at: support@kramgam.com
